welcome_message_body: "Welcome to East Cleveland, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant culture, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Hopkins International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used by United Airlines and its partners for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used by American Airlines and its partners for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used by Delta Airlines and its partners for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
